summary: This document is an email chain from January 2020 regarding scheduling an 'Epstein update mtg' between the FBI New York field office and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. The emails coordinate meeting times around operational schedules.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.role: Assistant U.S. Attorney, Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of an email coordinating a meeting time for an 'Epstein update' discussion with FBI chiefs and unit chiefs.

events.title: Epstein Update Meeting Scheduling
events.description: Email correspondence finalizing a meeting time (Wednesday at 1:00 PM) for an 'Epstein update mtg' between the FBI New York field office and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: The email chain is dated January 6-8, 2020, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in August 2019.
The subject is 'Epstein update mtg', indicating ongoing investigative or procedural discussions related to the Epstein case.
Participants include an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York and personnel from 'FBI New York'.
The scheduling involves coordinating with 'unit chiefs' and 'chiefs', suggesting a high-level briefing.
The FBI mentions having 'operations' on Tuesday and Thursday, indicating active investigative work related to the case.
